head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Woman Assaulted In Furniture Store

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Woman Assaulted In Furniture Store

body.head.byline: By Thomas J. Lueck (NYT); Compiled by George James

abstract.p: Armed man sexually assaults woman in Jennifer Convertibles store in Bay Ridge section Brooklyn and flees scene; police have not made any arrests (S)

block.p: An armed man walked into a Jennifer Convertibles store in Bay Ridge yesterday, forced a woman who was in the store into a back area, sexually assaulted her and fled, the police said. Investigators said the woman, whose identity was not disclosed, was taken to a nearby hospital. They said the attack occurred about 1 p.m. after the man entered the store, on 4th Avenue between 85th and 86th Streets, and displayed a handgun. There were no arrests as of last night, and it was unclear whether the man had taken any cash or merchandise, the police said.
